title: xxSPOTLIGHT Undari's Tower
text: The great mage left behind all manner of useful recipes
blocka: xxACTION Herbal Compress. Spend xxPROGRESS equal to mission difficulty to remove one mild xxBODY condition.
blockb: xxACTION Magical Research. Purchase a sorcery development. Place in asset discard pile.

title: xxSPOTLIGHT Lavender Mill
text: The great hub of Red Bank bustles with activity.
blocka: xxACTION Refinery. Gain one resource die of any type.
blockb: xxACTION The Forge. Purchase a technology development. Place in asset discard pile.

title: xxSPOTLIGHT Amber Lodge
blocka: xxACTION Map Hall. Spend xxPROGRESS equal to mission difficulty to look at the top asset card on either draw pile. Return the card to the top when finished.
blockb: xxACTION Secrets Revealed. Purchase an espionage development. Place in asset discard pile.

title: xxSPOTLIGHT Sightrock Keep
blocka: xxACTION Tactical Planning. Spend xxPROGRESS equal to mission difficulty to take an asset from your discard pile into your hand.
blockb: xxACTION Training Grounds. Purchase a military development. Place in asset discard pile.

title: xxSPOTLIGHT The Great Hall
blocka: xxACTION Rest and Relaxation. Spend xxPROGRESS equal to mission difficulty to remove one mild xxPSYCHE condition.
blockb: xxACTION Great Council. Purchase a diplomacy development. Place in asset discard pile.

title: Outer Fernbrake
risk: 0 xxRISK
text: Simple folk band together in the shadow of darkness.
rsummary: xxICE
blocka: xxICE Casualties of the Undead. If there any Restless Dead here, lose 1 xxSTABILITY.
blockb: xxACTION Community Building. If this is stage 4, Test (Command). Add successes to xxPROGRESS.

title: Gray River
risk: 1 xxRISK
text: The Gray River rolls through the shade of the dense elms, carrying dark earth from deeper within the forest.
blockb: xxACTION Mapping the Land. If this is stage 1, Test (Survival). Add successes to xxPROGRESS.

title: Mirror Woods
risk: 2 xxRISK
text: The source of magical power in the North.
blocka: For each progress token on this location, characters at North Oaks locations get +1 to tests against foes.
blockb: xxACTION Necromantic Ward. Spend 4 xxMANA and become weary to add one progress to this location.
blockc: xxACTION Battles Against the Undead. If this is stage 2, Test (Combat). Add successes to xxPROGRESS.

title: Musty Tomb
risk: 3 xxRISK
text: A place hiding the oldest secrets.
blocka: xxACTION Source of the Undead. Take 2 xxDISCORD to move any number of Restless Dead to this location.
blockb: xxACTION If this is stage 3, Test (Lore). Add successes to xxPROGRESS.

title: Hogel Manor
risk: For a Sunrider, Hogel's decorations and appointments are almost gaudy, and his demeanor doubly so.
rsummary: xxSUN Take 1 xxDISCORD for each issue in play at this location.

title: Horsethief Meadows
risk: Feats of martial prowess take place across the wide open plains.
rsummary: xxACTION Spend 6 xxPROGRESS to increase Security track by one.

title: Song Bluff
risk: Amongst the Sunriders, honor and family are more important than diversity of thought.
rsummary: xxQUICK Take xxDISCORD equal to Freedom.

title: Spirit Lake
risk: The clear waters of Spirit Lake still reflect back the wisdom of ancient ancestors. Feeding the lake earns the Sunriders' respect.
rsummary: xxACTION Spend 4 xxMANA to burn any issue in play at a Sunriders location.

title: The Rosy Freetrader
risk: A popular meeting place for both the poor and wealthy of Eastkeep.
rsummary: xxACTION Move one Graycloak to the Rosy Freetrader.

title: Map Hall
risk: Somewhere amongst the piles of maps and ledgers are useful Imperial plans.
rsummary: xxACTION Spend one xxSECRETS to gain two dice of any one resource.
blocka: xxQUICK One character at this location is weary.

title: House of Copper
risk: Through rings of smoke move cloaked figures willing to provide all manner of things for the right price.
rsummary: Effect: All characters at this location have +1 Disguise.
blocka: xxICE One character at this location is angry.

title: Guild of Secrets
risk: If there is a nexus of evil in Eastkeep, it is most certainly the guild of secrets.
rsummary: All obstacles at this location have +2 xxDISCORD.

title: Lush Fields
rsummary: xxACTION Spend 4 xxFORTUNE to gain one xxFOOD die.

title: Salmon Run
rsummary: xxACTION Task (Survival).
blocka: xxCIRCLE Spend 13 progress to raise xxFOOD track by one.
blockb: xxFORCEFUL One character at this location is weary.

title: The Weird Rock
rsummary: Effect: All characters at this location have +1 Lore.
blocka: xxMOON One character at this location is shaken.

title: Maplewood
rsummary: xxACTION Gain one xxTIMBER.

title: Spinner Lakes
rsummary: xxACTION Spend 8 xxLUXURY to gain one xxSECRETS.

title: Green Haven
rsummary: Effect: All characters increase their Thievery by Gravewood disposition while at least one character is at this location.
blocka: xxFIRE One character at this location is angry.

title: First Haven
rsummary: xxACTION Spend 3 xxLUXURY to discard one threat.

title: Dowling Farm
risk: Nexus of Imperial discontent.
rsummary: xxACTION Spend 5 xxLUXURY to gain one xxSECRETS.

title: The Salty Freetrader
risk: Where everybody - every single body - knows your name.
rsummary: xxQUICK One character at this location is weary.

title: Whitehold
risk: Graycloak headquarters in the breadbasket of the Empire.
rsummary: All guards (obstacles) at this location have +1 xxDISCORD.

title: Under Whitehold
risk: The caverns below Whitehold have both riches and traps.
rsummary: xxACTION Take two xxDISCORD to gain one xxLUXURY die.
blocka: xxFIRE One character at this location is wounded.

title: Sparrow Keep
risk: How is it that a nexus of such evil activity was allowed to grow so large?
rsummary: xxFORCEFUL One character at this location is wounded.

title: Outer Fernbrake
risk: The people of Outer Fernbrake are growing to distrust Thea's leadership.
rsummary: xxICE Gain one xxDISCORD for each xxTHREAT in the threat draw pile.

title: House of Cloves
risk: Swirls of intoxicating smoke tie together the deals and favors with an ephemeral bond.
rsummary: Spend 6 xxFORTUNE to gain two xxMANA dice.

title: Graywash Spring
risk: The river out of North Oaks winds its way through the community of close knit cottages.
rsummary: xxACTION Gain a number of xxFOOD dice equal to security.

title: Goldspike
risk: Who knows what future badness brings but the keeper of secrets in a chamber of gold?
rsummary: xxACTION Draw a threat.

title: Hall of Brass
risk: Zarrah greets all newcomers in the great hall of world renown.
rsummary: xxQUICK One character at this location is weary.

title: Beetle Burrough
risk: You look like someone who wants to know a secret?
rsummary: xxACTION Spend 5 xxLUXURY to gain one xxSECRETS.

title: Wrenhouse
risk: Both regret and conviction in equal measure.
rsummary: Gain 2 xxDISCORD to gain one xxLUXURY die.
